# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(cpp-parse LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(cpp-parse "")
set_target_properties(cpp-parse PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "cpp-parse")
set_target_properties(cpp-parse PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
set_property(TARGET cpp-parse PROPERTY C_STANDARD 99)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cpp-parse PRIVATE $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-TP>)
endif()
target_compile_options(cpp-parse PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
)
target_compile_features(cpp-parse PRIVATE c_std_99)
target_compile_features(cpp-parse PRIVATE cxx_std_17)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cpp-parse PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(cpp-parse PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET cpp-parse PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(cpp-parse PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(cpp-parse PRIVATE
    src/Main.cpp
    src/token/TokenParse.cpp
)
